General.Name: Citra Putra Realty Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Citra Putra Realty Tbk engages in the accommodation, food and beverage, and property businesses in Indonesia. The company purchases, sells, rents, and operates self-owned or leased real estate properties, such as apartment and residential buildings, exhibition venues, personal storage facilities, malls, shopping centers, and land. It also owns and operates hotels under The Stones Legian Hotel and Clay Hotel names. In addition, the company is involved in the wholesale of machinery, equipment, paint, varnish, and building supplies; and trade of rough wood, main processed wood products, and building materials, such as markets and gravel. Further, it provides consulting services in human resource, real estate property areas operation management and maintenance, property and asset appraisal, investment, architect, advertising, entertainment, and related business fields. Additionally, the company offers property agency, rental, management, and planning services; land and buildings entrepreneur services; room rental services; landscape, design, and interior, as well as management and business consulting services; and accommodation for visitors and travelers that are provided by various hotels, inns, hostels, villas, and other star hotels. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Citra Putra Realty Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Citra Putra Mandiri.
General.Address: Bidakara Tower 2, Lt. 17, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12870
